Texts.Chs:
恭喜, 你刚刚破坏了某些东西.
传送到星球/飞船来重新加载扫描交互处理程序.
如果该错误继续出现, 请在Steam上向作者报告这个Bug.
Texts.Eng:
Congratulations, you just broke something.
Beam down/up so the scan interaction handler re-adds itself.
If this keeps happening, report it as a bug on the Steam page.

Texts.Chs:
这个任务是由Ztarbound添加的。
接受，然后无视即可。
Texts.Eng:
This quest (handles the scan interaction feature added by Ztarbound.
Just accept it, and forget about its existence.
